0.prompt:
Hello and welcome to the Cannonball 2T1 Choose Your Own Adventure! Throughout the adventure you will be faced with many tough choices. Choose correctly and you shall be rewarded! Choose incorrectly and you shall….not be rewarded.

Our story alludes to many facets of SkuleTM tradition and culture. Want to learn more about the traditions, clubs, and people in the story? Simply click the bolded words to be taken to their website! Enjoy!
